about_the_game:
A Roguelike Tower Defense game set on a procedurally generated island. Build towers to protect your castle from the endless goblins hordes.

Roguelike


Earn unique cards from leveling up and relics from slaying bosses that enhance your towers stats, abilities and grants new powers. Crafting powerful synergetic builds make each playthrough feel new and exciting.

Procedural Generation


The defining feature of this tower defense roguelike is its user controlled procedurally generated levels. This gives the player a unique experience each playthrough, combining a compelling blend of strategic planning and unpredictable challenges. Castles on Clouds invites players into a thrilling world where each decision shapes the destiny of their kingdom amidst the clouds.

Shop


The Merchant brings powerful relics and cards. Create unique synergies giving your soldiers the ability to beat back the goblin hordes and protect the castle!
